<S%H783>Artaxerxes,<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H4428>kings,<s%> to <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H3549>priest,<s%> a <S%H5613>scribe<s%> of the <S%H1882>law<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> <S%H1585>perfect<s%> peace, and at <S%H3706>such<s%> a time.

I <S%H7761>make<s%> a <S%H2942>decree,<s%> that <S%H3606>all<s%> they of the <S%H5972>people<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel,<s%> and of his <S%H3549>priests<s%> and <S%H3879>Levites,<s%> in my <S%H4437>realm,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> are minded of their own <S%H5069>freewill<s%> to <S%H1946>go<s%> up to <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H1946>go<s%> with you.

That you may <S%H7066>buy<s%> <S%H629>speedily<s%> with <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H3702>money<s%> <S%H8450>bullocks,<s%> <S%H1798>rams,<s%> <S%H563>lambs,<s%> with their meat <S%H4503>offerings<s%> and their <S%H5261>drink<s%> offerings, and <S%H7127>offer<s%> them on the <S%H4056>altar<s%> of the <S%H1005>house<s%> of your <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> is in <S%H3390>Jerusalem.<s%>

And I, even I <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> do <S%H7761>make<s%> a <S%H2942>decree<s%> to <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H1490>treasurers<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> are <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>river,<s%> that <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H5830>Ezra<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> the <S%H5613>scribe<s%> of the <S%H1882>law<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> shall <S%H7593>require<s%> of you, it be <S%H5648>done<s%> <S%H629>speedily,<s%>

To an <S%H3969>hundred<s%> <S%H3604>talents<s%> of <S%H3702>silver,<s%> and to an <S%H3969>hundred<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of <S%H2591>wheat,<s%> and to an <S%H3969>hundred<s%> <S%H1325>baths<s%> of <S%H2562>wine,<s%> and to an <S%H3969>hundred<s%> <S%H1324>baths<s%> of <S%H4887>oil,<s%> and <S%H4416>salt<s%> <S%H3809>without<s%> <S%H3792>prescribing<s%> how much.

<S%H3605>Whatever<s%> <S%H3627><s%> is <S%H4480>commanded<s%> <S%H2941><s%> by the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> let it be <S%H149>diligently<s%> <S%H5648>done<s%> for the <S%H1005>house<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven:<s%> for <S%H4101>why<s%> should there be <S%H7109>wrath<s%> <S%H5922>against<s%> the <S%H4437>realm<s%> of the <S%H4430>king<s%> and his <S%H1123>sons?<s%>

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has <S%H5414>put<s%> such a thing as <S%H2063>this<s%> in the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> to <S%H6286>beautify<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%>
